languages.text: "Нет, древнее творение Человечества. Наша семейная реликвия — персональный генератор смещающего поля". {n}Вистенца касается пальцами солнечного сплетения.{/n} "Согласно преданиям рода Вьятт, он спас жизнь нескольких членов моего семейства, а сегодня, вероятно — и мою".

"No, it was an ancient creation of Humanity. Our family relic — a personal displacer field generator." {n}Vistenza touches her solar plexus.{/n} "According to Vyatt family lore, it has saved the lives of several members of my line, and most likely mine too, today."
languages.original_text: "Нет, древнее творение Человечества. Наша семейная реликвия — персональный генератор смещающего поля". {n}Вистенца касается пальцами солнечного сплетения.{/n} "Согласно преданиям рода Вьятт, он спас жизнь нескольких членов моего семейства, а сегодня, вероятно — и мою".

traits.locale_text: "No, it was an ancient creation of Humanity. Our family relic — a personal displacer field generator." {n}Vistenza touches her solar plexus.{/n} "According to Vyatt family lore, it has saved the lives of several members of my line, and most likely mine too, today."

"No, it was an ancient creation of Humanity. Our family relic — a personal displacer field generator." {n}Vistenza touches her solar plexus.{/n} "According to Vyatt family lore, it has saved the lives of several members of my line, and most likely mine too, today."

"No, it was an ancient creation of Humanity. Our family relic — a personal displacer field generator." {n}Vistenza touches her solar plexus.{/n} "According to Vyatt family lore, it has saved the lives of several members of my line, and most likely mine too, today."

"No, it was an ancient creation of Humanity. Our family relic — a personal displacer field generator." {n}Vistenza touches her solar plexus.{/n} "According to Vyatt family lore, it has saved the lives of several members of my line, and most likely mine too, today."

languages.text: “不，那是人类的古老造物，也是我们家族的遗物——个人型转移力场发生器。”{n}维丝坦萨揉了揉太阳穴。{/n}“根据维亚特家族历史记载，这个力场发生器曾拯救过好几位家族成员的性命。而且，它今天很可能也救了我一命。”
languages.original_text: "No, it was an ancient creation of Humanity. Our family relic — a personal displacer field generator." {n}Vistenza touches her solar plexus.{/n} "According to Vyatt family lore, it has saved the lives of several members of my line, and most likely mine too, today."

traits.locale_text: “不，那是人类的古老造物，也是我们家族的遗物——个人型转移力场发生器。”{n}维丝坦萨揉了揉太阳穴。{/n}“根据维亚特家族历史记载，这个力场发生器曾拯救过好几位家族成员的性命。而且，它今天很可能也救了我一命。”

languages.text: «No, fue una antigua creación de la Humanidad. Es una reliquia familiar, un generador de campo de desplazamiento personal». {n}Vistenza se toca el plexo solar.{/n} «Según la historia de la familia Vyatt, ha salvado la vida de muchos miembros de mi linaje, entre los que me encuentro desde hoy».
languages.original_text: "No, it was an ancient creation of Humanity. Our family relic — a personal displacer field generator." {n}Vistenza touches her solar plexus.{/n} "According to Vyatt family lore, it has saved the lives of several members of my line, and most likely mine too, today."

traits.locale_text: «No, fue una antigua creación de la Humanidad. Es una reliquia familiar, un generador de campo de desplazamiento personal». {n}Vistenza se toca el plexo solar.{/n} «Según la historia de la familia Vyatt, ha salvado la vida de muchos miembros de mi linaje, entre los que me encuentro desde hoy».

languages.text: 「いえ、古代人類の創造物です。ビャット家に伝わる遺物—個人転移フィールドジェネレーターになります」{n}ヴィステンツァは自分のみぞおちに触れる。{/n}「ビャット家の言い伝えによれば、一族の数人が遺物に助けられてきたとか。今日の私が命拾いしたのも十中八九、これのおかげでしょう」
languages.original_text: "No, it was an ancient creation of Humanity. Our family relic — a personal displacer field generator." {n}Vistenza touches her solar plexus.{/n} "According to Vyatt family lore, it has saved the lives of several members of my line, and most likely mine too, today."

traits.locale_text: 「いえ、古代人類の創造物です。ビャット家に伝わる遺物—個人転移フィールドジェネレーターになります」{n}ヴィステンツァは自分のみぞおちに触れる。{/n}「ビャット家の言い伝えによれば、一族の数人が遺物に助けられてきたとか。今日の私が命拾いしたのも十中八九、これのおかげでしょう」

languages.text: "Nein, das war eine alte Erfindung der Menschheit. Unser Familienrelikt – ein Personenverdränger-Feldgenerator." {n}Vistenza berührt ihren Solarplexus.{/n} "Laut Familienchronik der Vyatts hat er schon mehreren Mitgliedern meiner Linie das Leben gerettet, und heute sehr wahrscheinlich auch meines."
languages.original_text: "No, it was an ancient creation of Humanity. Our family relic — a personal displacer field generator." {n}Vistenza touches her solar plexus.{/n} "According to Vyatt family lore, it has saved the lives of several members of my line, and most likely mine too, today."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, das war eine alte Erfindung der Menschheit. Unser Familienrelikt – ein Personenverdränger-Feldgenerator." {n}Vistenza berührt ihren Solarplexus.{/n} "Laut Familienchronik der Vyatts hat er schon mehreren Mitgliedern meiner Linie das Leben gerettet, und heute sehr wahrscheinlich auch meines."

languages.text: « Non, il s'agit d'une ancienne création de l'humanité. Notre relique familiale, un générateur de champ téléporteur personnel, {n}explique Vistenza en se touchant l'abdomen.{/n} Selon l'histoire de la famille Vyatt, il a sauvé la vie de plusieurs membres de ma lignée, et probablement la mienne aussi aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "No, it was an ancient creation of Humanity. Our family relic — a personal displacer field generator." {n}Vistenza touches her solar plexus.{/n} "According to Vyatt family lore, it has saved the lives of several members of my line, and most likely mine too, today."

traits.locale_text: « Non, il s'agit d'une ancienne création de l'humanité. Notre relique familiale, un générateur de champ téléporteur personnel, {n}explique Vistenza en se touchant l'abdomen.{/n} Selon l'histoire de la famille Vyatt, il a sauvé la vie de plusieurs membres de ma lignée, et probablement la mienne aussi aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: "Hayır, kadim bir İnsanlık icadı sayesinde oldu. Ailemden yadigâr, özel bir geçişim alanı jeneratörü sayesinde." {n}Vistenza, karın boşluğuna dokunuyor.{/n} "Vyatt aile kayıtlarına göre atalarımdan birkaçının hayatını kurtarmış. Muhtemelen bugün listeye ben de eklendim."
languages.original_text: "No, it was an ancient creation of Humanity. Our family relic — a personal displacer field generator." {n}Vistenza touches her solar plexus.{/n} "According to Vyatt family lore, it has saved the lives of several members of my line, and most likely mine too, today."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır, eski bir İnsanlık eseriyle başardım. Aile yadigârımız olan özel bir geçişim alanı jeneratörü sayesinde..." {n}Vistenza, karın boşluğuna dokunuyor.{/n} "Vyatt aile kayıtlarına göre pek çok atamın hayatını kurtarmış. Muhtemelen bugün listeye ben de eklendim."
